ApprovalChainName.description: The name of the related approval chain. This field is populated when there are multiple approval chains that are run in parallel. This field is only available with Advanced Approvals enabled.

ApprovalConditionName.description: The name of the condition that assigns the work item to a user or group for approval.

ApprovalSubmissionId.description: The approval submission that's associated with this item.

AssignedToId.description: The user, group, or queue that was assigned the work item.

Comments.description: The comments added by the reviewer of the item.

FlowOrchestrationWorkItemId.description: The identifier of the associated flow orchestration work item.

IsAutoReviewed.description: Indicates whether the work item was auto-reviewed (true) or not (false).

IsEligibleForSmartApproval.description: Indicates whether the approval work item is eligible for smart approval (true) or not (false).

Name.description: The sequentially-generated name of the related record thatâ€™s submitted for approval, for example AWI-000000001.

RelatedRecordId.description: The API name of the related record that's submitted for approval.

RelatedRecordObjectName.description: The name of the related record that's submitted for approval.

ReviewedById.description: The identifier of the user that reviewed the work item.

ReviewedDate.description: The date and time when the work item was reviewed.

SmartApprovalBasisWorkItemId.description: The work item on which the smart approval is based.

Status.description: The status of the approval work item.
